titles.title: For the relief of Alexandre Malofienko, Olga Matsko, and their son, Vladimir Malofienko.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/8/1997--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.
